document.text:
From: Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk> 
To: 
(USANYS)" 
(USANYS)" 
Cc: Kate 
Tuckley 
<Kate.Tuckley@fca.org.ulc>, Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>, Harry 
Caldecott <Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.ulc>, Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>, Harry 
Caldecott <Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.ulc> 
Subject: RE: Confidential & Urgent 
Date: Thu, 28 Nov 2019 14:28:20 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.png; image002.png; image003.png 
Can I  ask whether this is still an active matter ? if so, I  wonder if we could speak 
when it is convenient. 
Cheers 
Mark Steward 
Executive Director 
Enforcement and Market Oversight 
A
FINANCIAL 
CONDUCT 
AUTHORITY 
12 Endeavour Square 
London 
E20 11N 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7066 1600 
www.fca.org.uk
Follow us: 
Private Secretary: Harry Caldecott (harry.caldecott@fca.org.)
Personal Assistant: Kelly Eldred S(kly.eldred@fca.org.uk) 
From: 
Sent: 28 November 2019 14:25 
To: Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk>; (USANYS) 
(USANYS) 
Cc: Kate Tuckley <Kate.Tuckley@fca.org.uk>; Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>; Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.ulc> 
Subject: Re: Confidential & Urgent 
> 
Looping in They run our unit and oversee the 
Epstein 
case. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 28, 2019, at 8:30 AM, Mark Steward <mark.Stewardtwfca.org.tAr> wrote:
Hi 
EFTA00018110

Can you let me know, urgently, whether anyone In your office Is handling the investigation into Jeffery 
Epstein, especially anything in relation to JP Morgan (he was a client of their private wealth division) and, 
if so, who, as we need to have a  chat. If this is not in SDNY, do you know who is handling ongoing work 
into Mr E's world ? 
Cheers 
Mark Steward 
Executive Director 
Enforcement and Market Oversight 
<imageOO1.png> 
12 Endeavour Square 
London 
E20 1.IN 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7066 1600 
www.fca.org.uk
Follow us: 
Private Secretary: Harry Caldecott (harry.caldecott@fca.org.uld 
Personal Assistant: Kelly Eldred (kelly.eldredgfca.orgA.Aci

info/legal/fca-classified-information).
